name: zip-state
description: Lightweight mapping of USPS ZIP Codes to their assigned region.

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run test && npm pack --dry-run ./zip-state
scripts.publish: npm run package && node ./scripts/confirm-publish.js && npm publish ./zip-state
scripts.test:examples: npm run example-common && npm run example-module && npm run example-ts
scripts.test: npm run test:script && npm run test:examples

author: Alec Perkins <code@alecperkins.me>
